013package org.apache.juneau.config.event;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.config.event.ConfigEventType.*;
017
018import java.util.*;
019
020import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
021
022/**
023 * Represents a change to a config.
024 */
025public class ConfigEvent {
026
027   private final ConfigEventType type;
028   private final String config, section, key, value, comment;
029   private final List<String> preLines;
030   private final String modifiers;
031
032   /**
033    * Constructor.
034    * @param type - The event type.
035    * @param config - The configuration name.
036    * @param section - The section name.
037    * @param key - The entry name.
038    * @param value - The entry value.
039    * @param modifiers - The entry modifiers.
040    * @param comment - Optional comment string to add on the same line as the entry.
041    * @param preLines - Optional comment lines that occur before this entry.
042    */
043   protected ConfigEvent(ConfigEventType type, String config, String section, String key, String value, String modifiers, String comment, List<String> preLines) {
044      this.type = type;
045      this.config = config;
046      this.section = section;
047      this.key = key;
048      this.value = value;
049      this.comment = comment;
050      this.preLines = preLines;
051      this.modifiers = modifiers;
052   }
053
054   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
055   // Static
056   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
057
058   /**
059    * Sets or replaces a value in a configuration.
060    *
061    * @param config
062    *    The configuration name.
063    * @param section
064    *    The section name.
065    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
066    * @param key
067    *    The entry name.
068    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
069    * @param value
070    *    The entry value.
071    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to remove an entry.
072    * @param comment
073    *    Optional comment string to add on the same line as the entry.
074    * @param modifiers
075    *    Optional entry modifiers.
076    * @param prelines
077    *    Comment lines that occur before this entry.
078    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
079    * @return
080    *    A new {@link ConfigEvent} object.
081    */
082   public static ConfigEvent setEntry(String config, String section, String key, String value, String modifiers, String comment, List<String> prelines) {
083      return new ConfigEvent(SET_ENTRY, config, section, key, value, modifiers, comment, prelines);
084   }
085
086   /**
087    * Removes a value from a configuration.
088    *
089    * @param config
090    *    The configuration name.
091    * @param section
092    *    The section name.
093    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
094    * @param key
095    *    The entry name.
096    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
097    * @return
098    *    A new {@link ConfigEvent} object.
099    */
100   public static ConfigEvent removeEntry(String config, String section, String key) {
101      return new ConfigEvent(REMOVE_ENTRY, config, section, key, null, null, null, null);
102   }
103
104   /**
105    * Adds a new empty section to the config.
106    *
107    * @param config
108    *    The configuration name.
109    * @param section
110    *    The section name.
111    * @param prelines
112    *    Comment lines that occur before this section.
113    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
114    * @return
115    *    A new {@link ConfigEvent} object.
116    */
117   public static ConfigEvent setSection(String config, String section, List<String> prelines) {
118      return new ConfigEvent(SET_SECTION, config, section, null, null, null, null, prelines);
119   }
120
121   /**
122    * Removes a section from the config.
123    *
124    * @param config
125    *    The configuration name.
126    * @param section
127    *    The section name.
128    * @return
129    *    A new {@link ConfigEvent} object.
130    */
131   public static ConfigEvent removeSection(String config, String section) {
132      return new ConfigEvent(REMOVE_SECTION, config, section, null, null, null, null, null);
133   }
134
135   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
136   // Instance
137   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
138
139   /**
140    * Returns the event type.
141    *
142    * @return The event type.
143    */
144   public ConfigEventType getType() {
145      return type;
146   }
147
148   /**
149    * Returns the configuration name.
150    *
151    * @return The configuration name.
152    */
153   public String getConfig() {
154      return config;
155   }
156
157   /**
158    * Returns the section name.
159    *
160    * @return The section name.
161    */
162   public String getSection() {
163      return section;
164   }
165
166   /**
167    * Returns the entry name.
168    *
169    * @return The entry name.
170    */
171   public String getKey() {
172      return key;
173   }
174
175   /**
176    * Returns the entry value.
177    *
178    * @return The entry value.
179    */
180   public String getValue() {
181      return value;
182   }
183
184   /**
185    * Returns the entry comment.
186    *
187    * @return The entry comment.
188    */
189   public String getComment() {
190      return comment;
191   }
192
193   /**
194    * Returns the section or entry lines.
195    *
196    * @return The section or entry lines.
197    */
198   public List<String> getPreLines() {
199      return preLines;
200   }
201
202   /**
203    * Returns the modifiers on this entry.
204    *
205    * @return
206    *    The modifier characters.
207    *    <br>Never <jk>null</jk>.
208    */
209   public String getModifiers() {
210      return modifiers;
211   }
212
213   @Override /* Object */
214   public String toString() {
215      return switch (type) {
216         case REMOVE_SECTION -> "REMOVE_SECTION(" + section + ")";
217         case REMOVE_ENTRY -> "REMOVE_ENTRY(" + section + (section.isEmpty() ? "" : "/") + key + ")";
218         case SET_SECTION -> "SET_SECTION(" + section + ", preLines=" + Utils.join(preLines, '|') + ")";
219         case SET_ENTRY -> {
220            var out = new StringBuilder("SET(");
221            out.append(section + (section.isEmpty() ? "" : "/") + key);
222            if (modifiers != null)
223               out.append(modifiers);
224            out.append(" = ");
225            var val = value == null ? "null" : value;
226            if (val.indexOf('\n') != -1)
227               val = val.replaceAll("(\\r?\\n)", "$1\t");
228            if (val.indexOf('#') != -1)
229               val = val.replace("#", "\\#");
230            out.append(val);
231            if (isNotEmpty(comment))
232               out.append(" # ").append(comment);
233            out.append(')');
234            yield out.toString();
235         }
236         default -> null; // NOSONAR - Intentional.
237      };
238   }
239}
